Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class cubescript::variable_base< T >

The base class for variable symbol types.

A variable symbol object refers to a native variable in the host programming language, operations in the scripting language are translated into native operations in the host environment.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T>
std::string cubescript::variable_base< T >::apply ( std::list< std::string > &  args,
domain *   
) [inline, virtual]

Assign value to variable.

Expects one argument only, providing any more arguments will result in an exception being thrown. The value passed is expected to have a string representation that can be lexically casted to the variable's type, incompatible notation will result in an exception being thrown.

Implements cubescript::symbol.

Reimplemented in cubescript::bounded_variable< T, min, max >.
